price: Wọn yó sì máa sọ̀rọ̀ ní jẹ́ẹ́jẹ́ láààrin ara wọn pé: “Ẹ̀yin kò gbé ilé ayé tayọ (ọjọ́) mẹ́wàá.”
arabic: يَتَخَٰفَتُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا عَشۡرٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yatakhāfatūna baynahum in labith'tum illā ʿashran
